title: Bold Sans-serif
content:
Any clue? Thanks in advance.

Font: 

 DIN Next 

Solved By:

author: coupdegrace

comments.content: Surely DIN and to get angled terminals possibly Text (as suggested by Kevin) or to me [Next](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132328/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-next), /O shape looking a bit closer but that's only my opinion :)
I think it's Next. The G/O look a bit more rounded out than Text. Thanks guys!
